body.p: Although the proposed treatment would have converged with that required by several liaison standard‑setters, for example, in US SFAS 128 Earnings per Share, the Board concluded that the notion of a rebuttable presumption is inconsistent with the stated objective of diluted earnings per share. The US Financial Accounting Standards Board has agreed to consider this difference as part of the joint short‑term convergence project with the IASB.
